resources.string:
Trace is a simple, fast, secure and free way to monitor your locations and show them by a heat map. You can restore a list of your precise coordinates in a separate page. The App is designed by a group of Cartography students of Technical University of Dresden (TUD) as a class project in January 2020. 

Group members are:

 Sebastian Hancock
 Valeria Shurupina
 Mostafa Kheyrollahi
 Shahtaj Ghufran
